annotations.annotation: Section 28 of the Federal Transit Act, referred to in paragraph (5)(L) of this section, was formerly codified at 49 U.S.C. Appx. § 1624 prior to repeal by Act July 5, 1994, P.L. 103-272, § 7(b), 108 Stat. 1379. For the present similar provision, see 49 U.S.C. § 5329.
This section is referenced in § 9-1109.02, § 9-1109.05, and § 9-1109.07.

For temporary (90 days) repeal of this section, see § 4 of Washington Metrorail Safety Commission Board of Directors Appointment Emergency Amendment Act of 2018 (D.C. Act 22-238, Jan. 27, 2018, 65 DCR 819).
